conclusion: Analyze the image to identify objects and shadows, reason through effects of moving light source, and provide conclusion.
The image shows four objects: a carton labeled 'A,' a plate with food labeled 'B,' a yellow sign labeled 'C,' and a baseball labeled 'D,' each casting a shadow.
Identify objects and shadows: carton, plate with food, yellow sign, and baseball cast shadows labeled A, B, C, and D.
Understand light source movement: moving forward above objects causes shadows to change.
Position change: shadows will move backward on the ground as the light source moves forward.
Size change: shadows will become larger because the light source is moving closer, increasing the angle of light rays.
Conclusion: shadows A, B, C, and D will move backward and become larger due to the light source moving closer.
